mapper.sql: with tmp_table as ( select cty_cd, admi_cd as id, admi_cd, admi_nm, minx, miny, maxx, maxy, centerx, centery, geom from tbshp_admi_features )
mapper.select:
select a.* , a.admi_cd as id , ST_AsGeoJSON(a.geom)::jsonb as geometry from tmp_table a where 1=1
and ST_Intersects(geom, ST_SETSRID(ST_MakePoint(#{xAxis}, #{yAxis}),4326)) = 'TRUE'

select sum(store_cnt) as store_cnt from cmapbatch.tbss_sum_sales_v2 a , tbshp_block_new b where a.block_cd_v2= b.blk_cd and b.admi_cd like concat(#{admiCd},'%') and a.upjong3_cd like concat(#{upjongCd},'%')
